actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend section 201(c) of the Federal Aviation Act of 1958 to provide that matters requiring a decision by the Civil Aeronautics Board shall be acted upon by a quorum of not less than three members of the Board meeting jointly, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Provides, under the Federal Aviation Act, that matters requiring a decision by the Civil Aeronautics Board shall be acted upon by a quorum of not less than three members of the Board meeting jointly.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 201(c) of the Federal Aviation Act of 1958 to provide that matters requiring a decision by the Civil Aeronautics Board shall be acted upon by a quorum of not less than three members of the Board meeting jointly, and for other purposes.
